alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Grand Forks; Pembina; Traill; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 12:24AM CDT until September 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Kittson County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Cavalier County in northeastern North Dakota... Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Pembina County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1224 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Olga to near Grafton to near Thompson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Forks, Thief River Falls, Grafton, East Grand Forks, Grand Forks AFB, Warren and Park River. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 121 and 217. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Grand Forks; Pembina; Traill; Walsh
